article_title: Cherry Creek tennis coach Kirk Price gets Gatorade shower
article_text:
As the Cherry Creek boys tennis team gathered to take a team photo with its state team trophy, it marked the end of an era for the Bruins.

For Kirk Price, who has guided the school to 23 titles in 25 years, it was the last time he would stand on the grand stage as the head coach of the team. And what better way to commemorate this moment than by dousing him with a big bucket of water.
